title.narrative: Technical Assistance to support Public Financial Management

description.narrative: This activity (Technical Assistance to support Public Financial Management) is a component of Public Financial Management Reform Programme Phase 4 reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £2,374,994. This component benefits Tanzania, and works in the following sector(s): Public finance management (PFM). , with the following implementing partners: Coffey International Development. The start date is 15-11-2011 and the end date is 30-11-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Accountability - General Public Service - Accountability - debt and aid management
